name: @drepkovsky/k-site
description: KSite is a react, bootstrap-like component library, build upon styled-components.
author: Dominik RepkovskÃ½

scripts.prepare-build: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir dist --extensions .ts --extensions .tsx --extensions .js --extensions .jsx --ignore "**/*.test.js"
scripts.copy: npx copyfiles package.json dist && npx copyfiles README.md dist && npx copyfiles .npmrc dist && npx copyfiles "/src/**/*.css" ./dist
scripts.build: npm run prepare-build && npm run copy
